A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved it after being super disappointed with the Force Awakens. This wasn't a perfect movie by any means\, had some disappointing story lines and others cut short and was a bit bloated\, but overall had a fantastic action\, twists and satisfying fan service.\nON A SIDE NOTE: There was one overhead shot of Chewy and the Millennium Falcon that calling it HORRIBLY AWFUL would give it a compliment. It appears the ship was 1/10th scale\, very bad they left that in the final cut.
